name: The Carbon Programming Language
description: The programming language powers all parts of the Project Parallel.
Applications written in Carbon must run on the Carbon Runtime, it cannot be run directly on bare metal.

name: Semicolon.OnlineJudge
description: A website like Luogu and CodeForce.
Users submit the solution of a problem, and the server tests the solution and let the user know.
The web application is written in C#, running on .NET platform.

name: Grades.Offline.WPF
description: An offline application, the only function is to let teachers to manage students' test result.
The application also provides the comparison table among each exam.
It is a winter vacation project. Only develops in 2020's winter vacation.
warning: The development of this project has paused since 2021.2.27

name: MCGit
description: I wanted to make it like Git in the beginning, but I gave up.
It is just a backup plugin currently.

name: RemoteDirectoryList
description: A website which allows you to view files and subdirectories in selected directory of remote computer.
The web application is written in C#, running on .NET platform.
warning: The development of this project has paused since 2020.9.19

name: OAHub
description: An office automation (OA) system for small teams.
Also the first big project I've ever developed. You can call it as an experimental project.
The web application is written in C#, running on .NET platform.
warning: The development of this project has paused since 2020.9.19
